mapper.select: SELECT c.userId, c.chatMessage, c.chatTime, u.userNickname, u.profileImage FROM `chat` c JOIN `user` u ON c.userId = u.userId WHERE c.groupId = #{groupId} ORDER BY c.chatTime DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `chat_history` SELECT * FROM `chat` WHERE chatTime < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `chat` WHERE chatTime < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
DELETE FROM `chat` WHERE userId = #{userId} AND groupId = #{groupId}
DELETE FROM `chat_history` WHERE userId = #{userId} AND groupId = #{groupId}
